deprecated_yaml.title: The Anthem A/V Receivers YAML configuration is being removed
deprecated_yaml.description:
Configuring Anthem A/V Receivers using YAML is being removed.

Your existing YAML configuration has been imported into the UI automatically.

Remove the Anthem A/V Receivers YAML configuration from your configuration.yaml file and restart Home Assistant to fix this issue.
